summary: Completed comprehensive testing of savings goal features: Dashboard displays active savings goal, Wallet page 'Add to Goal' button works correctly, Create savings goal flow works, Contribute to savings goal API works, Single goal auto-selection in allocation dialog works correctly.
passed_tests: âœ… GET /api/child/savings-goals - Returns list of savings goals for user
âœ… POST /api/child/savings-goals - Creates new savings goal with title, description, target_amount, deadline
âœ… POST /api/child/savings-goals/{goal_id}/contribute - Contributes from savings account to goal
âœ… Contribution deducts from savings balance correctly
âœ… Contribution increases goal current_amount correctly
âœ… Goal marked as completed when target reached
âœ… Dashboard displays 'My Savings Goal' section with active goal
âœ… Dashboard shows goal title, description, progress bar, and remaining amount
âœ… Wallet page shows 'My Savings Goals' section with all goals
âœ… Wallet page 'Add to Goal' button opens allocation dialog
âœ… Wallet page 'New Goal' button opens create goal dialog
âœ… Create Goal dialog has all fields: title, description, target amount, deadline, image upload
âœ… Single goal auto-selection works - no dropdown when only 1 active goal
âœ… Multiple goals show dropdown selector in allocation dialog
âœ… Contribution success shows toast 'Money added to your goal! ğŸ¯'
âœ… Goal creation success shows toast 'Savings goal created! ğŸ¯'
âœ… Admin login works with provided credentials
seed_data_creation: Created test users with savings goals for testing. Test data cleaned up after testing.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Savings goal features fully tested and working. Dashboard.jsx fetches savings goals via /api/child/savings-goals and displays the first active (non-completed) goal. WalletPage.jsx has 'Add to Goal' button that opens allocation dialog - when there's only 1 active goal, it auto-displays without dropdown; when multiple goals exist, a dropdown selector is shown. The contribute endpoint at /api/child/savings-goals/{goal_id}/contribute deducts from savings account and adds to goal's current_amount. Goals are marked completed when current_amount >= target_amount.
